content.detailedDescription:
I figured this would be a decent place to say what i witnessed. i look up at the night sky quite often. especially when the stars are clear, that's the greatest time. i was driving home from a late afternoon in ann arbor, mi. it's around 6:15 as i was approaching the limits of the town i reside in. i pull into my drive way around 6:22pm, i remember this on my clock as i turned my car off. i immediately look at the stars, as i noticed how clear of a night it was going to be on my way home. i wish i knew the constellation i was looking at, ill look it at it tomorrow at the same time when i witnessed it.

i watched this object intently for several seconds, i had my glasses on so my vision was precise compared to my contact lenses. i'm trying to give myself credit here. after watching it move from south to north, it got a little brighter and increased in size (from the brightness). then it faded into the distance. i'm not sure what it was, but the object was starlike, just the same size as other stars. i caught it in motion and followed it as it glided across the night sky. it got brighter and stood out even more, then disappeared.
content.summary: Starlike object moving then brightened

content.detailedDescription: After it was at about 80 ft are so and stop. it shot strat up with a snap of your finger .After it was gon sheets of ashis was falling like a left falls and the ashs was glowin. this ufo was as big as a school house. and i will never forget it
content.summary: Ufo came up behind the powerlin and out of the woods it wint up about 80 ft no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in clinton township, mi taking pictures of a unique severe storm on the eve of july 19, 2013.  i was facing east the entire time (approximately 25 mins). i took well over 100 pictures and a few videos.  i found i captured two pictures that had a cigar shaped craft in them.  with the naked eye, i did not see the craft.  i uploaded all the pictures to the computer and that is when i discovered the two pictures of the craft.
picture number 210139 shows a distinct cigar shaped craft trailing the severe storm.  the other picture taken earlier (picture #12155) was of a cigar shaped craft (possibly the same craft) along with a lightning strike that looks like it hits the craft or is coming from the craft.  both pictures are not enhanced.  this event appears to have taken place approximately 1/4 mile to 1/2 mile (??) away from my location.  i estimate that the craft was about 700-800 (??) ft off the ground.  it is at a 120 degree angle or 60 degrees depending how you measure degrees.  it made no sound.  it looks like it is bigger than a commercial airliner.  it is dark gray and dull in color. 
i am sending in the 2 pictures so you can take a look at them. the reason i am sending these pictures is to inform you that when the severe storms pass over my home, i constantly see this exact shape object trailing or "riding along" with these high energy storm systems.  this storm in 2013 is the start of my sightings.  since then and up to 2015, i have taken pictures of 5 separate severe storms and have captured many cigar shaped objects moving with these storms.  most of these crafts follow closely behind wall clouds.  i am sending you some of those pictures too.  
if you have any questions about any of my sightings or pictures, please let me know and i can tell you more about each one i have witnessed.  you may be able to see a pattern that seems to be ongoing.  i have also reported some of these picture to mufon, previously. i have more pictures available of these cigar shaped crafts. 
thank you for your time and interest.
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft trailing severe storm in clinton township, mi 7-2013.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?

i was heading home from work, driving down hwy 90 heading east towards downtown san antonio. i sighted the craft near lackland afb, shortly after a church location.

2. what made you first notice the object?

i saw a dark object out of the corner of my eye that stood out specifically because it was darker than the sky behind it, with blinking lights coming from underneath it.

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?

i knew it was a hovering aircraft but i had no first person knowledge of any known aircraft. i am fairly knowledgeable about aircraft, having lived on an air force base, and this craft was hovering in place and completely silent. it took up much of my line of sight out of the right side of my windshield as i leaned forward. it was massive, hovering close to the freeway. it didn't move closer but it was angled in a way to where i could only see the underside of the craft. the lights were blue, green, yellow and white. the colored lights were blinking and the white lights were solid. 

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.

the object hovered above ground, unmoving, as if parked.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.

i felt feelings of bewilderment as my mind searched for possible explanations for what i was seeing. i pressed the breaks a few time to slow my traveling so as to keep it in my line of sight. i considered stopping just before losing it from my view, but decided against it as it was a busy highway.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it was on my right side, off the highway and when i passed the point  where i could see it from my windshield, i looked behind me, searching for it in my rear view mirrors i could only see black. the lights were not visible.
content.summary: Saw underside of black triangle ufo

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were at edgewater park, in cleveland, ohio, capturing the sunrise on wednesday, december 16, 2015 at 7:15am. as my friend was looking through his images he took that morning, he saw this unknown object that he thought would interest me, which it did. he proceeded to meet with me to show me two pictures of the unknown flying object he captured in the cleveland skyline that appears to be moving fairly quickly. the object first appeared below the top of the tower, from the cleveland key tower building. then, several seconds later, it appeared above the lake, in the cleveland skyline. after i saw his image, i saw something in my picture that was take very close to the same time as his second image, but it had moved farther away. when i first noticed mine, i thought it could had been part of the object my friend captured, as he thought, a lens flare but i believe it could be light from the flying object as well. the object had red lights and could have had some silver included in the flying object. my feelings of this were confused, shocked and interested being i have never captured anything this strange before, nor has my friend. my reactions to this is wanting to know if my image has any relationship to the two images my friend took, which could be very possible. my actions before the image was not knowing but after looking through my images, i then became curious and confused. how i lost sighing of this unknown flying object was taking taking a picture not too long after and seeing that noting like my image appeared in it.
content.summary: Silver and red shape, possibly was straight before the time posted

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: While helping my son work on his truck, we noticed a passenger jet coming up from the south headed to birmingham international airport. as left view because of trees i noticed a  bright slow moving light coming from the southwest. i told my son to look at that and we both this wasn't a plane or chopper. i ran inside and grabbed my binoculars and looked at the object. through the binoculars i could see the light had a fog like hue to it. it also made a 45 degree turn that was really different than a normal aircraft. i then took put my cell phone and was able to record a few seconds of the object. it also made no sound. my son and i lost view of it as it went past the tree line. i am sorry the video isn't great, i forgot to zoom in and now understand why people have messed up video its hard to think and get it all before its gone.
content.summary: Very bright light low changing speed and a 45 degree turn

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving due east when i noticed a low flying single engine airplane at a low altitude..This is unusual in the my highly populated area (oak park il) this was at 545 am as i was driving to work. seeing the  low flying aircraft caused me to scan the sky as i was stationary at a stop light. i then noticed that off in the distance due east and to the south i saw a large series of orbs that were forming a v formation. the lights were very bright and constant(silver whitish lights). they were above lake michigan not moving just stationary in this constant v formation. at this point i had entered onto interstate 290 head east toward chicago il. the v formation was still due east and to the south above the lake. these were not aircraft lights of any type. they maintained that formation for my entire journey(5 min apprx). the orbs that formed the v was made up of 4 glowing balls of silver/white light and appeared to be at least 100 feet apart from each other..I videoed the lights with my iphone ..I lost sight of the object as i exited to get to my place of business  my field of view was obstructed by the multi story buildings and trees in chicago

why they were unusal is because they were so bright and the formed such a usual pattern..I am very use to seeing airliners and helicopters as a part of my daily existence and these were highly unusual!!

i felt shocked perplexed and excited by what i was seeing ..The classic expression of i can't believe my eyes comes to mind..
content.summary: Large triangle pattern orbs stationary off to the south east above lake michigan ..

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back deck. had just finished smoking a cigarette. it was  somewhat cloudy/frosty. i saw pinpoints (3or4) of light hitting the tree line in the lot on the north side of my house. as i looked more intently, i saw a bright ball (well defined circle) of light, high in the sky, through the tree tops. it moved west to east at extremely high speed, visible for less than approx. 2 seconds. in a straight line.
  as i said. it was hazy/cloudy. i presume i saw the ball of light when it passed between clouds. it just appeared, then disappeared. also the " pinpoint" flashes on the trees may have been some kind of reflection? the entire event lasted less than 10 seconds.
 i live within 1 mile of the joliet il. airport, and this area is a landing flight path for midway airport. in 38 years, i've seen planes at all altitudes, landing lights from the sides and front, etc. i have good "feel"  for airspeed of planes from the vantage point of my deck. and i've seen shooting stars. whatever this was, it moved at an incredibly high rate of speed, and may only be the brightest shooting star i've ever seen, this low in the sky. 
 i wonder if there were any planes in a landing pattern at the time. it would have been easily visible for them.
content.summary: Pinpoints of light reflected off trees in back of side lot. then saw bright circle of light in sky, moved incredibly fast! meteor?

content.detailedDescription: We were both at the pier in lakewood, ohio hoping to catch a beautiful sunrise of the skyline of cleveland.  when we both are photographers we tend to only notice the scene, not many specifics.  when we got back from our morning i did my normal photo analysis and found a weird silver stick-like figure by the key bank building, and so i zoomed in and found that the figure has a metal look to it.  i first got other opinions and when even my professors told me "i have no clue what that is" i knew i caught something literally out of this world.  at first i was a skeptic and thought it was a plane, but there are no wings, maybe a bird, but again no wings and no head.  i finally smartened up and concluded it was a ufo.  the object was unnoticed until my photo analysis was finished, so the movement on the second photo was the little light that shot into the distance.  i felt as though there was a different presence while we were both shooting, but i could not put my finger on it.  it was a weird comfort i had up until the object shot off.  the sunrise was suppose to be at 7:45am and the photos were documented at 7:15am.  there was cloud cover all over, but the object was in sight under the cloud cover, which means it was flying too low in the city for a plane.  sight was lost when it shot off towards the lake area.  this raises the question, is this a ufo or a uso?  we may never know, but my findings could become key.
content.summary: Cylindrical metal object that seemed out of place near the key bank building in ohio city

content.detailedDescription: Talking to a neighbor in his front yard i caught a glimpse of a shinny metal disk while facing e by se my first thought was to identify the aircraft however there were no wings i thought the aircraft was making a banked turn so i looked closer and the oval shiny object disappeared. i worked in aviation for 38 years and can identify most commercial aircraft and we live on the flight path to louisville ksdf airport. aircraft fly over on downwind leg before turning on final they usually are flying around 3000 feet as they usually lower main gear as they pass over the ohio river. sometimes aircraft approach further to the east about 10-12 miles away so i've had plenty of observation time and used location/elevation based on prior observation. the silver object had no wings the sky was clear blue vfr conditions the object simply disappeared after about 10 seconds of motionless flight.
content.summary: Observed object in sky then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was dog watching and let the dogs out in the back yard getting ready to go to bed. i noticed a greyish/white object in the sky. i didnt recognize what it was so i kept watching and became a little scared.  i looked at my watch and it was 8;34pm.  it wasnt windy just a few clouds in the sky.  i then took the dogs inside and then went back outside.  the object stayed in the same general area flying around randomly.  i didnt hear any noise...I kept watching then went back in and got my phone to record. however, the object was to far away so i couldnt record it...I went back inside and then went back outside about 15 minutes later and then there were two objects exactly the same.  they were really high and i just watched in amazement. i never lost sight of the object i went back into the house after about ten minutes.  i didnt know anyone in the neighborhood so i couldnt ask them to look at the sky.
content.summary: I saw one ring/oval greyish object moving about in the same area then about 10 minutes later a second object appeared. they would move side by side and separately

content.detailedDescription: Was standing at the river taking pics of the clouds and lightning and spotted the ufo after looking at the photo. i can even see a vapor-like emission coming from the bottom as commonly described.
content.summary: Was standing at the river taking pics of the clouds and spotted the ufo after looking at the photo.

content.detailedDescription: On january 30th i was stargazing in my backyard with two other witnesses. i was looking in the direction of the orion constellation, the others were adjusting the telescope. i saw a glowing white shape move directly upward into my line of sight. at first i thought it was a satellite, but it was moving too quickly and was too large to be one. i alerted the other two witnesses, and they watched with me as it passed overhead. it looked to be slightly bigger than an airplane, and at one point passed behind a small cloud on its path, so i know it was travelling at a high altitude. it maintained a steady speed. i don't believe it was a meteor because it didn't give off much light, and it moved across the entire sky without disappearing or breaking up. the shape was very difficult to make out, because it was dim and opaque, but my best estimation is that it was an oval, or cigar. two thirds of the way through the event, the object changed color slightly and looked pink. we watched it until it moved behind the trees, and we couldn't see it anymore. i was excited to see my first potential ufo, and we discussed it at length and stayed outside watching the sky for a couple more hours, but we didn't see anything else out of the ordinary.
content.summary: A dimly glowing shape that moved overhead in a straight line from south to north until it was out of sight.

content.city: They were above and in th
content.detailedDescription:
Has anyone seen any uso/ufo's dancing in and above lake michigan of the great lakes in the usa in the coldest winters nights? i have, but only in the winters coldest days in the waters between silver lake sand dunes, mi. and waukegan, il. i have seen the dancing lights and i am not the only one. 
i will be 50 this july, and i have seen them for many years and i am just wondering if anyone else has reported uso's/ufo's in the great lakes on the winters coldest days. 
i have always been told it is a trick of the light but we have seen these lights ever since the 1970's, and i am not so sure what we have been seeing after all.
i have found out there are secret military test ranges in a few places the great lakes with absolutely no confirmation, i can find anywhere yet.
content.summary: Dancing light/ lights over the great lakes in the coldest winter nights.
content.locationName: They were above and in th, Michigan

content.detailedDescription:
Commuting from redwood city (bay area)to skyline blvd (tallest ridge dividing bay area and pacific ocean. saw amber ball of light come from ocean of pescadero beach (short distance from north of santa cruz.Ca{monterey bay area})only us two people on the road because no one at that time commuted to santa cruz mts. object rising from ocean off of pescadero beach (20miles from us)saw us (headlights)and came straight toward us. 150'diameter stopped 200' in front of our '72toyota landcruiser with spotlight on roof with no sound. i jumped out of car waving my arms and jumping up and down in front of large amber ball of light(partner styed in the car, because he was soooo scared) 10min into it,i turned on the spotlight toward object (sending sos),and it responded moving up and down,side to side, and diagonally and stopped in the same position with no sound. i did this around eight or more times, and it always would repond to me the same way (45mins) within a second it went straight up out of sight leaving a long com trail. 
1998-best friend and her brother on hwy 1 thru pescadero beach in the afternoon car gauges and engine stopped with no visual signs of anything. in 10mins car started back up.
1974-6months later as commuting home to boulder creek,ca saw the same amber ball of light in the sky (1:30am)looking as if it was in trouble waivering up and down spewing looking like molten lead from its behind (went out of sight from curvy road and mountains.

my big question is what is in the monterey bay that is soooo deep.
content.summary: Uso fom pescadero beach ocean to us on palo alto county skyline blvd

content.detailedDescription: Well i woke up early in the morning to go pee. finished my business and walked back to my room.  wanted a cigarette so i opened my window and stuck my head out and lit my cigarette.  started scanning the sky like i all ways do.  right away i see this saucer shaped object hovering in the sky. so i grabbed my camera and started filming. a couple minutes pass by and all of the sudden from the south comes another object.  this object was similar to the first object except it had a tail.  so the first object fades away while the 2nd object stops and starts to hover. while hovering the tail slowly fades away and becomes a perfect saucer shape like the 1st object. 2nd object hovered for a few minutes and slowly faded away.
content.summary: Spotted object hovering. grabbed camera started filming. 1 minute in another object came in slowly from the south with tail. 1st object disapeard. while 2nd object hoversd and slowly vanished.

content.detailedDescription: My sister just told me about this today she lives just outside of grants pass. the object just appeared then changed direction the string of pictures lasted almost 30 minutes. the odd thing is she has no memory of the incident she had these on her camera the next day and uploaded them to her computer. i thought you should be made aware of this incident. my sister gave me permission to post these pictures.
content.summary: Strange comet or missile like object with blue glowing tail

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were looking at a star flickering. and it passed right over head. not a noise not a light, it seemed fleshy almost. there was rib like tubes or something under it. this thing went from being 300-feet or so above our heads to gone in under 2 seconds. freaked out enough to call,911-operator hung up on me. didn't know what to do. never seen nothing like it before
content.summary: Me and one other person stunned, never seen anything like it, quite fast abnormal

content.detailedDescription: I pulled into my driveway and was astonished at this red/orange extremely bright orb. the sun is on the left in my picture. the orb is on the right. it was so bright i could not look at it. this was not a reflection i got out of my truck and took four pictures and there is also a green orb below it in all photos. i watched it for five minutes. then parked my truck and looked again, it was von. silent. strangest thing i have ever seen!!!!
content.summary: This was so bright it hurt my eyes. this was not the sun

content.detailedDescription: I pulled into my driveway and was astonished at this red/orange extremely bright orb. the sun is on the left in my picture. the orb is on the right. it was so bright i could not look at it. this was not a reflection i got out of my truck and took four pictures and there is also a green orb below it in all photos. i watched it for five minutes. then parked my truck and looked again, it was von. silent. strangest thing i have ever seen!!!!
content.summary: This was so bright it hurt my eyes. this was not the sun

content.detailedDescription: I pulled into my driveway and was astonished at this red/orange extremely bright orb. the sun is on the left in my picture. the orb is on the right. it was so bright i could not look at it. this was not a reflection i got out of my truck and took four pictures and there is also a green orb below it in all photos. i watched it for five minutes. then parked my truck and looked again, it was von. silent. strangest thing i have ever seen!!!!
content.summary: This was so bright it hurt my eyes. this was not the sun

content.detailedDescription: In november of 1974 while hiking in the hills of prescott arizona with my bestfriend . we heard a humming pulsating noise we looked up and saw a craft come over the ridge/tree tops it was quite simply a saucer shaped craft with lighted panels that light up in a rotating patern around the craft. it was quite loud humming pulsating with these lighted panels it was a quite awsome it scared us it came over th ridge hovered a bit kinda went down into the valley on other side of ridge and then it took off just that simple it looked like a stereo type flying saucer. what can i say very
content.summary: While hiking in woods with a friend we heard a mono tone humming pulsating like a heart beat we saw a craft come over a ridge line it was typical saucer type craft with square colored panels that light up in a rotating patern around the craft it took off.

content.detailedDescription:
I keep seeing reddish objects hovering around my house and path to work as well as small pinkish orbs, i have had cell phone interruption as well small things missing from the house. i don't know what the hell these things want now - i was abducted once around 2011 and i would like for my clocks, phones and tv to work correctly. i live in buffalo<ny and i see them hovering very close to the sun a lot on the bus and train,

hope you can help!
content.summary: Reddish stripes or objects in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Looked like really bright and big star and despair after maybe 40 sec.
content.summary: Looked like really bright and big star and despair after maybe 40 sec.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside of my home, watching the stars as i usually did at night. i noticed what i thought was an odd line of stars, which were a yellow/orange colour all spaced equally apart from one another. after i had focused my attention on them, i watched as one slowly started to move off to the side and then slowly moved forward and vanished. after the first left, the next did the exact same pattern as the first. within two minutes (give or take) they had all disappeared after following the same pattern. while i was watching it, i couldn't believe what i was seeing. after they had left, i sat in a daze and then went inside with a knot in my stomach- realizing i had just seen something similar to when i was a child.
content.summary: 6 lights in a row, with directional change and then leaving one at a time in rapid succession

content.detailedDescription:
I was 6 years old, and on my way into north bay with my father and brother. my father noticed a light in the sky, which caught his attention. something about it appeared unique to him, being a seasoned police officer and so he pulled the car over. when we pulled over, we all got out out of the car and looked up at the object. from my memory, it appeared to pulsate and was a large circular shape. i'm unsure of the colour as it was so long ago. we watched it for what i am guessing was close to 10 minutes as it sat there, and then started to take off. i remember being fascinated, and unsure of what it was while my father assured me it was nothing frightening. it was never mentioned again although i never forgot it.

a year or so ago, i asked my father if he remembered the event as i did. being an adult now, he told me how he actually felt at the time- which was incredibly scared as he had never seen anything like it, and still hasn't since the event. he remembered vividly about the event.
content.summary: Pulsating light in the sky, hovering over a waterfall w/ military base nearby

content.detailedDescription: Driving to garberville to drop a friend off that also witness what i saw..
content.summary: Seen hovering above trees not hills over where this was and there was a weird odd orb or glow  or something moving up to it or exiting it..

content.detailedDescription:
As stated in the year (2001) i was pretty young, only in about 5th grade. i was staying the night at my friend's house. we couldn't sleep so we went outside to play (around 0200 or later). to the north, i saw an orange light that was occasionally flashing coming towards us. i figured it was an aircraft or something. it took quite a while for it to reach my friend's house. as it got closer i noticed it was a triangle shape, we just learned about different airplanes from a field trip we took and i thought it looked like a concord jet. as it got even closer we realized it didn't have wings. it was an actual triangle, all black. the orange light was located at the front of the aircraft and was slowly flashing. there was another black triangle, slightly higher in altitude escorting the object, both moving at the same slow speed. the second black triangle didn't have a flashing light or any light at all. we could see both aircraft because of the size and the lack of starlight where the aircraft was located. the lowest aircraft flew almost over the top of us and was flying very low to the ground. the aircraft was not a normal size (it was much larger) for the airplanes we usually see flying in the area, nor was it flying at the altitude we usually see airplanes flying. at no point did it make any sound, even when it was at it's closest point it made absolutely no sound. we both figured it was just some airplane... we watched it slowly move across the sky to the south until we couldn't see it anymore. from what i remember it didn't have any effect on my friend or myself, or the several dogs he had.
one of the things that stood out the most, besides the lack of sound, was how slowly the object was moving.
content.summary: Black triangle shape

content.detailedDescription: It was about 9:30 pm,just got back from buying milk at 7-11. i was in the driveway,  i always look at the night sky when i get home that late . when i looked up , i seen something that didn't seem right. i seen like light blu-ish stars but they seemed to be moving. i ran inside real quick , called my mom , she came outside and and didn't know what to say. all i know is that she knew herself that what we were looking at were not airplanes. we stood outside in for about 15 minutes observing these objects. they would appear out of nowhere in the southern night sky with a bright light blu-ish light , and them seemed to be going in a south to north direction. there were at least 20 or more.
content.summary: I seen light blu-ish objects that didn't look like stars , went inside called my mom to come see this , we observed multiple hovering lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along i-75 when i spotted this seemingly stationary object.  i used my daughters monocular to view it and it was an oval object with no familiar shapes or markings.  snapped several photos as best as i could but had to remain safe with children in car. eight year old observed object as well.
content.summary: Sighted from moving vehicle.   stationary.
